item.description:
Hi all,

So the time has finally come when I could finally organize another Pub Run, so here it is. I will nail down the complete list of bars as we get closer to the event, but I was thinking staying in the back back/kenmore area to relive some of the moments of just a few days before at Marathon Monday! I will keep the distance at about 0.5 miles in between bars.

I will post more info and FAQ as we get closer as well as the full list of bars. Hope to see you there!

Jen

Update 4/21/09 full list of bars, If you cannot make it to the first bar or two, no worries! Just send me a text and I can give you our location and eta to next bar!

O'Leary's
1010 Beacon St
Brookline, MA 02446
Phone: (617) 734-0049

An Tua Nua
835 Beacon St
Boston, MA 02215-3303
Phone: (617) 262-2121

Cornwall's
654 Beacon Street
Boston, MA
(617) 262-3749

Crossroads Irish Pub
495 Beacon St
Boston, MA 02215
(617) 262-7371

Whiskey's
885 Boylston St, Boston, MA
(617) 262-5551

MJ O’Connor’s
27 Columbus Ave, Boston
(617) 482-2255

Beantown Pub
100 Tremont St Boston, MA 02108
(617) 426-0111


FAQ to be posted soon!

FAQ:
How long is Pub Run?
It varies but we spend about 30 minutes at each bar and about 15 minutes to get everyone from one bar to the next!

How far is it between bars?
About .5 miles, the longest is about .75 miles between bars.

What should I bring?
Your ID, $$, T-pass, maybe a camera. I would recommend a small backpack or one of those cinch backpacks.

What should I wear?
Running gear, including running shoes. Dressing in layers is highly recommended. If you have them, bring reflective materials/ blinking lights as it will be dark for the last few runs.

What will happen if it rains?
We'll get wet when running (yes pub run is rain or shine!)

What should I do to get ready for Pub Run?
Make sure to eat and hydrate well in the morning!

Will it be fun?
Well gosh, of course!

Happy running and see you on Saturday!

Jen
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in running gear drinking a beer

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: PUB RUN!
